nodes.text: The Recruiter for the Empire was an Imperial badge awarded to individuals who were recognized for "outstanding recruitment endeavors for the Empire."
One such badge was awarded by Imperial High Command to a spacer during the Empire Day festivities of 1 ABY, in honor of the Imperial's recruiting efforts, due to it being recognized by High Command.

The Recruiter for the Empire appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-roleplaying game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
